LanguageData.WNA_Aeroblaze.label: aeroblaze
LanguageData.WNA_Aeroblaze.description: Mark target as a orbital strike positioning beacon. Chimingblaze Celestrike Satellite Network will then adjust and focus, deliver a merciless strike to the target. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Coagulate.label: coagulate
LanguageData.WNA_Coagulate.description: Perform first aids with multiple professional medical devices. No medicine is needed. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_SaboteurJump.label: long jump
LanguageData.WNA_SaboteurJump.description: Saboteurs have recevied professional trainings, they can make long-distance jumps without using any other equipments. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_SaboteurJump.verbProperties.label: jump
